subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Oh, sure, there are some fond memories of those Washington Nationals who played at R.F.K. Stadium in 2005, back when even if the old ballpark might not have been much of a home, at least it was a home.
